the top part of the skull or head; the crown.
the top part of the body in humans, the apes, etc.; the head.
the part of the face between the eyebrows and the line where the hair normally begins.
the upper part or portion of anything.
the crest or summit of a hill or mountain ending in a point; a peak.

ನೆತ್ತಿಕಣ್ಣಾಗು netti kaṇṇāgu to become very haughty or overbearing; to behave insolently; ನೆತ್ತಿಗೇರು nettigēru = ನೆತ್ತಿಹತ್ತು; ನೆತ್ತಿಬೀಳು nettibīḷu (the tender crown of children) to dip a little; ನೆತ್ತಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಹೊರು nettiyalli horu (fig.) to undertake very sincerely, religiously and humbly, a work as directed, instructed by another.
= ನೆತ್ತಕಾರ.
(myth.) the all-destroying fiery eye on the forehead of Śiva.
(myth.) Śiva, who has an all-destroying fiery eye on his forehead.
the tender, top part of the skull of children.
a pearl or pearls believed to be in the head of an elephant.
to cause head-ache.
a kind of ornament for the head.
